Summary: Glowing object streaked by below clouds extremely high rate of speed UFO
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around June 17th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter and I witnessed a flashing object steak by creating a glowing orange trail in a flash. This was level below the clouds and I am an amateur astronomer. This was not a meteor. It flew in a straight line towards the south east coast of NY (Long Island bound) at an extremely high rate of speed (beyond anything imaginable). I had no time to take pictures. The speed alone was phenomenal.
